Premium Wood Fencing Solutions in Seattle

Discover our exceptional range of wood fencing options, perfect for enhancing your property's beauty, privacy, and security. From classic picket fences to modern horizontal designs, our expert team delivers top-quality wood fencing solutions tailored to your needs. Explore our collection and transform your outdoor space today!

Our Premium Wood Fence Collection

Discover the perfect blend of aesthetics and functionality

Privacy Fence

Create a secluded sanctuary with our sturdy privacy fences, perfect for homeowners seeking maximum seclusion and security.

  • Complete privacy
  • Enhanced security
  • Windbreak protection

Picket Fence

Add a touch of classic Americana to your property with our charming picket fences, ideal for defining boundaries with style.

  • Decorative appeal
  • Child and pet-friendly
  • Enhances curb appeal

Split Rail Fence

Embrace rustic charm with our split rail fences, perfect for large properties and creating a natural, open feel.

  • Rustic aesthetic
  • Ideal for large areas
  • Wildlife-friendly

Standard Horizontal

Achieve a modern look with our standard horizontal fences, offering clean lines and contemporary style for any property.

  • Modern appearance
  • Sturdy construction
  • Versatile design

Board on Board

Enhance privacy and aesthetics with our board on board fences, featuring overlapping boards for a seamless, gap-free appearance.

  • Maximum privacy
  • Attractive from both sides
  • Increased durability

Explore Fence Shapes

Discover how different fence shapes can enhance your outdoor space

Convex

Arching outward, convex fences create a gentle curve that adds visual interest and a welcoming feel to your property.
